object.name: answerWebAppQuery
object.description: Use this method to set the result of an interaction with a Web App and send a corresponding message on behalf of the user to the chat from which the query originated. On success, a SentWebAppMessage object is returned.
object.html_description: Use this method to set the result of an interaction with a Web App and send a corresponding message on behalf of the user to the chat from which the query originated. On success, a SentWebAppMessage object is returned.
object.rst_description: Use this method to set the result of an interaction with a `Web App <https://core.telegram.org/bots/webapps>`_ and send a corresponding message on behalf of the user to the chat from which the query originated. On success, a :class:`aiogram.types.sent_web_app_message.SentWebAppMessage` object is returned.

annotations.description: Unique identifier for the query to be answered
annotations.html_description: Unique identifier for the query to be answered
annotations.rst_description: Unique identifier for the query to be answered
annotations.name: web_app_query_id

annotations.description: A JSON-serialized object describing the message to be sent
annotations.html_description: A JSON-serialized object describing the message to be sent
annotations.rst_description: A JSON-serialized object describing the message to be sent
annotations.name: result
